import React, {useRef, useEffect} from 'react'; import Parallax from 'parallax-js' import Contact from '../contacts/contsct'; import Footer from '../footer/footer'; import Header from '../header/header'; const MainPage = () => { const sceneEl = useRef(null); useEffect(() => { const parallaxInstance = new Parallax(sceneEl.current, { relativeInput: true, hoverOnly: true }) parallaxInstance.enable(); return () => parallaxInstance.disable(); }, []) return <>

Portfolio site of Alexandra Kuchynskaya

F R O N T - E N D

About me

Hi, I’m Alexandra. Nice to meet you.

Since beginning my journey as a front-end developer, I've done remote work for different companies and collaborated with talented people to create digital products for both business and consumer use. I’m a hard working, multitasking and dedicated professional with scrupulous eye for detail and a determination to deliver the highest quality. I always try to better myself with every project I work on. I also posses subtle sense of humour and excellent communicative skills.
